00027 MVec4::MVec4()
00028 {
00029         _data = Align16( _array );
00030         MemSet( _array, 0, sizeof( _array ) );
00031 }

00033 //----------------------------------------------------------
00034 MVec4::MVec4( float x, float y, float z, float w )
00035 {
00036         _data = Align16( _array );
00037         _data[ 0 ] = x;
00038         _data[ 1 ] = y;
00039         _data[ 2 ] = z;
00040         _data[ 3 ] = w;

00043 //----------------------------------------------------------
00044 MVec4::MVec4( const MVec3& vec, float w )
00045 {
00046         _data = Align16( _array );
00047         _data[ 0 ] = vec.GetX();
00048         _data[ 1 ] = vec.GetY();
00049         _data[ 2 ] = vec.GetZ();
00050         _data[ 3 ] = w;
00051 }

00055 {
00056         _data = Align16( _array );

00058         _data[ 1 ] = v._data[ 1 ];
00059         _data[ 2 ] = v._data[ 2 ];
00060         _data[ 3 ] = v._data[ 3 ];
00061 }

00092 MVec4::MakeVec3( MVec3& vec ) const
00093 {

00096         vec.SetZ( _data[ 2 ] );
